DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Latest Commits
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"height":"300","scrolling":{"mode":"virtual","showScrollbar":"onHover"},"columnAutoWidth":false,"dataSource":{"load":"function(){            var daysAgo = 30;            var date = new Date(Date.now() - daysAgo * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);            var auth = 'token {githubToken}';            return SkillsWorkflow.Github.getCommits(auth, null, null, null, date).then(result => {return Promise.resolve(result)}            );        }"},"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"columns":[{"dataField":"","caption":"","cellTemplate":"function(e, i){                if(i.data.author != null){                    SkillsWorkflow.Utils.setExternalImage(e, 'small', i.data.author.avatar_url);                }else{                    SkillsWorkflow.Utils.setExternalImage(e, 'small', 'https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2013/07/13/12/07/avatar-159236_960_720.png');                 }                   }","width":38,"alignment":"center"},{"dataField":"commit.author.name","caption":"Name"},{"caption":"Time Ago","alignment":"center","calculateCellValue":"function(data){                return SkillsWorkflow.Utils.timeAgo(data.commit.author.date);            }"},{"dataField":"commit.author.date","dataType":"date","caption":"Date","alignment":"center"},{"dataField":"commit.message","caption":"Message"}],"selection":{"mode":"none"}}
